attributes.description: The Rail Network (NTAD 2015) is a comprehensive database of the nation's railway system at 1:24,000 to 1:100,000 scale. The data set covers all 50 States plus the District of Columbia.
attributes.short-description: The Rail Network (NTAD 2015) is a comprehensive database of the nation's railway system at 1:24,000 to 1:100,000 scale. The data set covers all 50 States plus the District of Columbia.
attributes.subtitle: FRA Railway System
attributes.title: Amtrak Rail Lines -- U.S.
